problem_text_cn: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=9,BC=12,AD是∠BAC的平分线,若点P,Q分别是AD和AC上的动点,则PC+PQ的最小值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, ∠ACB = N_0, AC = N_1, BC = N_2, AD is the bisector of ∠BAC, if points P and Q are the moving points on AD and AC, then the minimum value of PC + PQ is ()
raw_answer: 解:过点D作DE⊥AB于点E,过点E作EQ⊥AC于点Q,EQ交AD于点P,连接CP,此时PC+PQ=EQ取最小值,如图所示．在Rt△ABC中,∠ACB=90°,AC=9,BC=12,∴AB=√{AC^{2}+BC^{2}}=15．∵AD是∠BAC的平分线,∴∠CAD=∠EAD,在△ACD和△AED中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠CAD=∠EAD}\\{∠ACD=∠AED=90^{°}}\\{AD=AD}\end{array}\right.,∴△ACD≌△AED(AAS),∴AE=AC=9．∵EQ⊥AC,∠ACB=90°,∴EQ∥BC,∴\frac{AE}{AB}=\frac{QE}{BC},即\frac{9}{15}=\frac{QE}{12}∴EQ=\frac{36}{5}．故选:B．
